resources:
Diakôluô Version 0.1.0 - Antonin LOUBIÈRE - GPL 3 Title Default description, a description can be very long. When I say very long, it\'s because a description can become very long. But I think I can do less long but it\'s needed to the demo. Created the $1%s at $2%s Last modification the %1$s at %2$s You have done %d tests General Columns Answer Play Select the number of questions: Select the number of column shown: %d/%d validate Continue (Skip) %.2f/20 %d/%d Restart Main menu Description Delete test Are you sure to delete this test : \"%s\" ? Cancelcheck Delete Edit The title can\'t be blank A test with this name already exist. Error Warning Add answer Add column %s: Column type: No test selected. Select a test to show his informations. Export List of tests \"%s\" has been deleted close Welcome Welcome on Diakôluô ! To start using Diakôluô, you need to set some settings.\n\nDiakôluô is an open source project under the GNU Public License 3.0. Source code is available on GitHub. Accept and continue Note: you can change this in settings at any point Allow the send of crash report for development purpose only. Allow the send of anonymous non-sensible data for development purpose only. Settings Settings Privacy Next Previous %1$d/%2$d New Create new column Do you want to create a new column ? Create Create new answer Do you want to create a new answer ? Select export file type: All features may not be available in this format ! Save number of test done Write column name at the top of the file Save column type at the top of the file Separator: Export error An error occur during the importation. The file may not work. The test has been successfully exported Import
Diakôluo file (.dkl)
Csv file (.csv)
Comma (\",\")
Semi-colon (\";\")
